result.html: Níl ionat ach buachaill beagYou're only a small boy.
result.ponchtml: Níl ionat aċ buaċaill beagYou're only a small boy.

result.eng: I think you're spending too much time in the pub.
result.ga: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairne
result.orig: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairne
result.html: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairneI think you're spending too much time in the pub.
result.ponchtml: Ceapaim go ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ barraíoċt ama sa teaċ táḃairneI think you're spending too much time in the pub.

result.html: Déan mar a deirtear leatDo as you're told!
result.ponchtml: Déan mar a deirtear leatDo as you're told!

result.html: Níl ionat ach cailín beagYou're only a small girl.
result.ponchtml: Níl ionat aċ cailín beagYou're only a small girl.

result.html: Níl ionat ach girseach bheagYou're only a little girl.
result.ponchtml: Níl ionat aċ girseaċ ḃeagYou're only a little girl.

result.eng: Visit me when you're in the country.
result.ga: Tabhair cuairt orm nuair a bheidh tú sa tír
result.orig: Tabhair cuairt orm nuair a bheidh tú sa tír
result.html: Tabhair cuairt orm nuair a bheidh tú sa tírVisit me when you're in the country.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair cuairt orm nuair a ḃeiḋ tú sa tírVisit me when you're in the country.

result.ga: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.orig: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.html: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do ċuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.

result.html: Tá fáilte romhaibhYou're welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roṁaiḃYou're welcome.

result.html: Tá fáilte romhatYou're welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roṁatYou're welcome.

result.ga: Tá tú chomh dubh le deatach
result.orig: Tá tú chomh dubh le deatach
result.html: Tá tú chomh dubh le deatachYou're as black as smoke.
result.ponchtml: Tá tú ċoṁ duḃ le deataċYou're as black as smoke.

result.html: Tá tú nach mór annYou're almost there.
result.ponchtml: Tá tú naċ mór annYou're almost there.

result.html: Tá tú sa bhealach ormYou're in my way.
result.ponchtml: Tá tú sa ḃealaċ ormYou're in my way.

result.ga: Go raibh maith agat - Tá fáilte romhat
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat - Tá fáilte romhat
result.html: Go raibh maith agat - Tá fáilte romhatThank you. - You're welcome.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat - Tá fáilte roṁatThank you. - You're welcome.

result.eng: You're interested in football, right? You could say I am!
result.ga: Tá spéis agat sa bpeil an bhfuil D'fhéadfá a rá go bhfuil

result.ponchtml: Tá spéis agat sa bpeil an ḃfuil D'ḟéadfá a rá go ḃfuilYou're interested in football, right? You could say I am!

result.html: Níl tú féin póstaYou're not married yourself?
